login.title: Sign in
login.description: Access Every Breath and Life with your account credentials.

notifications.error: We couldn't sign you in. Check your details and try again.

forgotPassword.title: Reset your password
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we'll send reset instructions if it exists in our system.
forgotPassword.helpText: We send the same message even if the address is not registered to protect your privacy.

notifications.success: If the address is on file, you'll receive a reset email shortly.
notifications.error: We couldn't start the reset process right now. Please try again later.

resetPassword.title: Choose a new password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password to finish resetting your account.
resetPassword.helpText: Use at least 8 characters and avoid reusing old passwords.

notifications.missingToken: This reset link is invalid or has expired. Request a new one to continue.
notifications.success: Your password was updated. You can now sign in with it.
notifications.error: We couldn't update your password. Try again or request a new reset email.

changePassword.title: Change password
changePassword.description: Update your password to keep your account secure.
changePassword.helpText: Use at least 8 characters combining letters, numbers, or symbols.

notifications.error: We couldn't change your password. Confirm your current password and try again.
